ratings.comment: Super fun classes and Denise is amazing! Love her! The first week can be a little scary because she talks kind of fast in spanish but after a few weeks it gets easy and most people end up with an A! We always did fun activities (she brought her dog!) and my writing got a lot better.
Very good class and teacher! Would definitely take again!
Denise is an amazing professor. She cares about her students and their learning. She is funny and you will never be bored in her classes
One of my favorite professors! Denise is so sweet and a very lenient grader, but she also gives good feedback on assignments. Class was fun to go to, but sometimes got off track.

Denise is very sweet and entertaining, she makes sure everyone is involved and does what she can to make it an enjoyable experience. Essays aren't long and there's guidance throughout on writing them. Thinks of interesting assignments like going to Human Ecology and describing things in Spanish. She has a pug named Tommy :)

Professor Castillo is by far the best professor I have had during college thus far. She really seems to respect and love her students. After not taking Spanish for a year I was nervous about taking an advanced Spanish course but Professor Castillo made all my fears go away. Shes a blessing to have on this campus, if you can take her class, do it.

Denise is one of my favorite instructors of all time. She is very fun, knowledgeable, funny, and genuinely wants to see every student improve. She gives great feedback on the several essays you write, and gives you a good grade as long as you demonstrate effort and improvement. Denise fostered an environment that made me look forward to class.

Denise is the most wonderful and endearing human being ever, and she's great at giving constructive feedback and clearly communicating with students. I have never skipped a lecture partially because the class content is crucial, but mostly because the lectures are entertaining and engaging. You need to come in with an adequate amount of knowledge.

She is very personable, absolutely amazing at teaching, and extremely relatable. Her teaching style is easy to follow and keeps you engaged in your learning. As long as you stay on-task and finish your assignments on time, you'll easily be able to pass the class. I would love to take her class again!
it was awesome

Denise is a self-described "easy grader". If you show up to lecture every day and even put in the slightest bit of effort you will get an A. Class is definitely worth it if you took AP Spanish in high school and want all of the retro credits.
A very good Professor. She was always so understanding and respectful.

Denise is such a caring and kind person! Her classes were always so fun and she is super funny too. As long as you put in the effort and really try to become a better Spanish writer, this class should be a breeze!
Professor Castillo's lectures were very helpful and easy to understand. She is very enthusiastic and funny.

Such a sweet and caring person! Lectures are pretty much mandatory but they're so much fun I wanted to attend them. She's very helpful and kind, and I definitely improved my abilities throughout the semester. I wish I could take this class over and over again, it takes some work but it's more than worth it (plus, she's really pretty!)

Denise is such a fun and caring professor! She gives really helpful feedback on all of your writing assignments which is good since the class is about writing development. Attendance does impact your progress report, there is homework, but no tests, only wiring assignments. would definitely recommend!! ps. Denise is very pretty :)

Denise is awesome! Such a nice person and is very clear and accessible. Her instructions are very straight-forward and homework is very manageable with other school work. If you ever had questions she was always willing to explain and just wanted us all to succeed.

Denise was AMAZING. 226 is based on personal growth through essays. She is super helpful and caring. She genuinely cares about the class and her students. I would highly recommend taking her class. 100/10!!!!!

Denise is SO funny and makes class genuinely interesting. She cares for her students and wants everyone to improve. Her main goal in my opinion is to get students to engage and improve. She is awesome!!

Denise is a really sweet woman who cares about students improvement. The grading system is weird bc she grades based off of improvement vs individual grades so its hard to tell where youre at. Other than that she does her best to make the class fun and interactive. The homeworks can take a long time so dont wait until the day before its due
Super nice :)

"If you rate me, please say I'm hot" I loved this class!! Denise presents the information in an easy-to-understand format and allows for lots of in-class practice. She is always energetic and finding ways to keep class interesting and fun. I wish I could have taken this in person, but her energy over-the-screen is still contagious.

Denise's classes are always engaging and fun. She is so sweet, kind, funny, and makes herself available to anyone who needs help! The structure of the class is very organized and she presents information in a clear and precise way, giving lots of examples and practice through repetition. I wish I could've met her in person.
Denise is an amazing professor and always keep the class interesting. She's super helpful and kind. 10/10 recommend.
good prof

Denise truly cares about her students! She really wants everyone to succeed and is so ready to help you at a moments notice! I would recommend her to anyone who is taking a Spanish class. Even during the Corona switch to online, she kept classes fun, which is really hard to do! She is a super fair grader as well! If you get the chance, take it!

Denise Castillo is so spirited and puts effort into helping students improve their Spanish. Although she tends to speak quickly, her fast pace allows students to grow their listening comprehension skills. She always provides useful feedback on papers, and she evaluates each student on an individual basis. Highly recommend taking her classes!

Denise really cared about each of her students as a TA. She was always available for help outside of class, and made an effort to learn the names of all of her students in a large lecture. She talked very fast, but was sure to repeat herself enough times that you got the general message. Overall a great TA and a very fair grader.
Denise encouraged her students all of the time and seemed like she really wanted them to succeed. She was overall an amazing teacher and made class fun!
Denise is great. She knew all of our names by about the end of the 2nd class. She gives a lot of feedback on your writing and its actually helpful. Shes approachable and funny.
Denise was awesome. If you genuinely put effort into the course, you would do well.

Denise is a very nice, down-to-earth person. She is an easy grader and tries to get the whole class involved. The class was easy for me so that helps. I took four years of Spanish in high school and I thought it was very easy.

Denise was my favorite TA this semester. She is so kind and cares about all her students. She learned all of our names very quickly and is very endearing as well as being an awesome Spanish TA. She grades quite easily as long as you try and are decently good at Spanish. Would recommend her to anyone.
Sweetest teacher I've had here.
Denise was a kind TA for 204 and I would recommend her to anyone. Really cared about all her students and was a very very easy grader.
